title: Russian Ministry of Defense claims 58 drones were shot down over Russia in last hours: 11 over Belgorod region, 8 over Bryans...
content: Russian Ministry of Defense claims 58 drones were shot down over Russia in last hours: 11 over Belgorod region, 8 over Bryansk region, 29 over Voronezh region 8 over Kursk region, 1 over Leningrad region and 1 over Ryazan region
author: Live UA Map
